sentences.sContent: This paper studied emphatically the heat steadiness of naphthaline and compatibility of naphthaline with carbon steel.
sentences.sContent_eng: This paper studied emphatically the heat steadiness of naphthaline and compatibility of naphthaline with carbon steel.
sentences.sCn: 本文着重对萘的热稳定性以及碳钢萘间的相容性进行实验研究。

sentences.sContent: The risk occurrence in futures market not only harm the benefit of investors, but also harm the steadiness of the futures market.
sentences.sContent_eng: The risk occurrence in futures market not only harm the benefit of investors, but also harm the steadiness of the futures market.
sentences.sCn: 期货市场风险的发生，严重损害了投资者的利益，对期货市场的稳定造成了极大的危害。

sentences.sContent: It was this steadiness and loyalty to her comrades that most appealed to the British officers who later agreed to train her to become an SOE agent.
sentences.sContent_eng: It was this steadiness and loyalty to her comrades that most appealed to the British officers who later agreed to train her to become an SOE agent.
sentences.sCn: 正是这种坚持稳定和对同志的忠诚打动了那位英国军官，成为他后来同意将她训练为一名特别行动处特工的最重要原因。

words.tran: 稳定地；稳固地；有规则地
关系固定的情侣；固定支架
